item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 16
item.description:
Issued at 0300Z WED SEP 10 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  16
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
0300Z WED SEP 10 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 20.6N  48.8W AT 10/0300Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  20 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST-NORTHWEST OR 295 DEGREES AT  12 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  948 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 115 KT WITH GUSTS TO 140 KT.
64 KT....... 40NE  30SE  30SW  40NW.
50 KT.......100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT.......150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
12 FT SEAS..225NE 175SE 175SW 225NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 20.6N  48.8W AT 10/0300Z
AT 10/0000Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 20.6N  48.3W
 
FORECAST VALID 10/1200Z 21.3N  50.4W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
64 KT... 40NE  30SE  30SW  40NW.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 11/0000Z 21.5N  52.3W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
64 KT... 40NE  30SE  30SW  40NW.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 11/1200Z 21.5N  53.9W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
64 KT... 40NE  30SE  30SW  40NW.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 12/0000Z 21.5N  55.5W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 13/0000Z 21.5N  58.5W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 14/0000Z 22.0N  61.5W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 15/0000Z 23.0N  65.0W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 20.6N  48.8W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 10/0900Z
 
FORECASTER FRANKLIN
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
